snippet: Michael Colby spent years living at the famous Manhattan hotel, which his grandparents owned, and has written a memoir about growing up there.
abstract: Michael Colby, whose grandparents Ben and Mary Bodne once owned and lived in Manhattan's Algonquin Hotel, recalls his years visiting and living in hotel; Colby has written about his life there in memoir The Algonquin Kid: Adventures Growing Up at New York’s Legendary Hotel.
lead_paragraph: Michael Colby spent years living at the famous Manhattan hotel, which his grandparents owned, and has written a memoir about growing up there.

headline.main: Finding a Home, and a Muse, at the Algonquin Hotel
headline.print_headline: The Algonquin Hotel as a Home, and a Muse
